vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Lim & Associates, Inc. to provide land surveying services for the Dallas Floodway Extension which includes the Great Trinity Forest - Not to exceed $783,000.00 - Financing:  Storm Drainage Management Operations Fund ($468,000.00) and Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($315,000.00)
